comments:
Eclipse 3.0 I20040519

1) Go to the preferences->PDE->Target Platform
2) Select the location of a target platform
3) Reload the plugins.
4) Click on "Not in Workspace"

Nothing happens even though there are a few plugins in the workspace that 
should be deselected. Here's the log file:
